name: RAI
description: RAI is a strong advocate for retailing in India and works with all levels of government and stakeholders. Its charter is to support employment growth and career opportunities in retail, to promote and sustain retail investments in communities from coast-to-coast, and to enhance consumer choice and industry competitiveness. RAI also provides its members with a full range of services and programs including education and training, benchmarking and best practices, networking, policy advocacy, and industry information. Thus, RAI is a lead trade association representing an entire gamut of retailers, from chain store retailers and department stores to independent emerging retailers, selling a wide selection of products across cities, towns, rural and virtual stores.
Headline: Retailers Association of India (RAI) is the unified voice of Indian retailers.
ShortDescription: Retailers Association of India (RAI) is the unified voice of retailers in India. A not-for-profit organisation, RAI works with all stakeholders for creating the right environment for the growth of modern retail industry in India. It encourages, develops, facilitates and supports retailers to modernise and adopt best practices that will delight customers.
enhanced_description: RAI (Retailers Association of India) is a not-for-profit trade association serving as the unified voice for Indian retailers. It actively engages with government and stakeholders to promote and sustain retail investments, enhance consumer choice, and foster industry competitiveness across India. RAI provides a comprehensive suite of services to its members, including advocacy support, networking opportunities, and programs focused on talent development, education and training, benchmarking, and best practices. These efforts are geared towards supporting employment growth, career opportunities, and improving employee happiness and engagement within the retail sector. The association represents a wide range of retailers, from large chain stores and department stores to independent and emerging retailers across various formats, including physical and virtual stores.
